Representation Exploration

Sentiments of Emojis

Real-time representation of Emojis from Twitter

Mentors

Amit Kapoor

Tools

Javascript, D3.js, Adobe XD

Duration

2 weeks

Course

Information Visualization

Emojis have recently evolved into a language to express and heavily used across social platforms for the same reason. In this project, I am exploring a way towards storytelling through the real-time emojis from Twitter
